News.Title: Trom Industries Secures ₹25.8 Cr Order
News.Summary: Trom Industries has won a significant order worth ₹25.8 crores, representing a substantial business development for the company with a market capitalization of ₹71 crores.

News.Title: Trom Industries Secures ₹25.8 Crore Order
News.Summary: Trom Industries has secured a significant order worth ₹25.8 crores, representing a substantial business development for the company which currently maintains a market capitalization of ₹71 crores.

News.Title: Trom Industries Wins ₹4.45 Cr Solar & Lighting Deals
News.Summary: Trom Industries secures contracts worth ₹4.45 crores for solar EPC and municipal lighting projects, strengthening its project execution pipeline and expanding its presence in renewable energy sector.

News.Title: Trom Industries Secures 37.7 Crore Rupee Order from Breda
News.Summary: Trom Industries has received an order worth 37.7 crore rupees from Breda. The company's current market capitalization stands at 228 crore rupees.

News.Title: Trom Industries Secures 376.5 Million Rupee Order from BREDA
News.Summary: Trom Industries has received a significant order worth 376.5 million rupees from BREDA (Bihar Renewable Energy Development Agency). This order represents a substantial business opportunity for the company and indicates potential growth in their operations or revenue.

News.Title: Trom Industries: Q2 Profit Doubles, Stock Surges 15%
News.Summary: Trom Industries reported a significant increase in net profit for H1 FY25, jumping to ₹4.13 crore from ₹1.97 crore year-over-year. Revenue nearly doubled to ₹46.23 crore. The company recently secured solar project contracts worth ₹33.10 crore. The stock price rose 15% to ₹260 on NSE SME following the results announcement.

News.Title: Trom Industries: 5% Jump on ₹20.70 Crore Gujarat Metro Rail Order
News.Summary: Trom Industries' stock rose over 5% after securing a ₹20.70 crore order from Gujarat Metro Rail Corporation for solar power projects on 15 metro stations in Ahmedabad.
